Skills & Qualifications: Consider the skills, strengths, knowledge and competencies you possess as it directly relates to the position. Additional Experience: Use this section to discuss additional work experience and to show some of your work history. Try to touch on transferrable skills that would also be beneficial in the job you are seeking. Memberships: Include organization name and dates of membership. References: Provide only if requested.
